welcomeSection.title: GraphiQL-clone
welcomeSection.welcomeDescr: GraphiQL is a browser-based user interface for interactively exploring the capabilities of, and executing queries against, a GraphQL API. Unlike the SL1 REST API, all requests to the GraphQL API on a given SL1 system use the same URI.
welcomeSection.welcomeProj: The application was made as a final task of the Rolling Scope School -

about.features4: Documentation explorer with ability to navigate back in queries

auth.emailPatternErrorMessage: E-mail must contain minimum 3 symbols that can be letters, digits or special characters (-_$!%*#?&) before @
auth.passwordPatternErrorMessage: Password must contain minimum 8 symbols, at least one letter, one digit, one special character (-_$!%*#?&)

notFound.descrText: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist.
